desc: A spotlight pointing up to create that nice and moody cone of light.

desc: Memories of Bridgton, Maine. Oh no! Not again!!!

desc: If you want your daily electricity, this is a must have! No tinkering unless you're a pro.

desc: Diurnal Butterfly.

desc: You better not stop in front of it.

desc: This giant easter egg must be from the Jurassic period or something because it is so huge.

desc: A strange bioluminescent plant. Or is it a mushroom?

desc: World Lock made from concentrated dark matter. Has the same abilities as a normal World Lock. Returns to your inventory when broken.
Available in the Item Packs|Shop for 28 000 Gems.
Can be obtained from Quests|Daily Quests.
Decays after 365 days of inactivity.
A Decayed Lock is a lock that is decayed after a period of time of inactivity. Once decayed, the lock would be accessible and can be smashed by everyone.
Tooltip|Small Lock, Tooltip|Medium Lock, Tooltip|Large Lock, Tooltip|Battle Lock and Tooltip|Faction Battle Lock decay after 90 days of inactivity.

Tooltip|World Lock, Tooltip|Dark World Lock, Tooltip|Battle World Lock, Tooltip|Faction Battle World Lock and Tooltip|Platinum Lock decay after 365 days of inactivity. Tooltip|Newbie World Locks decay after 30 days.
People with rights can't refresh the locks.
Logging in with your account resets the timer.

Locks an area of 3x3 blocks. Returns to your inventory when broken.
Available in the Item Packs|Shop for 100 Gems.
Small lock decays after 90 days of inactivity.
Locks the entire world. Can only be placed on a world where no one else already has a lock. Returns to your inventory when broken.
Available in the Item Packs|Shop for 3,500 Gems.
World Lock decay after 365 days of inactivity.
Three rockets that shoot to the sky lighting up the sky with stunning explosions.
Can be obtained from the Fireworks Booster.

Alien Orb.desc: A mysterious orb that changes the background of your world into a strange alien planet.

Basic Cat Food.desc: This raw fish smells delicious! Well, at least from a cat's perspective. Feed it to your pet cat to satisfy it's hunger.

Basic Dog Food.desc: Every dog likes a juicy bone. Feed this to your pet dog to satisfy it's hunger.

Basic Slime Food.desc: These little green jelly balls are the basic nutrient for slime blob pets. Ingredients unknown.

desc: This basic fishing lure has a Good chance of catching any fish species. Has a Small chance for catching any ingredients.
Can be obtained from Fishing Kit.
Good chance of catching Carp. Medium chance for Halibut and Ingredients. Small chance for other Fishes|Fish.
Can be obtained from the Lure Booster.

Blood Scroll.desc: Consuming this scroll will take you to the Deep Nether.

desc: Excellent chance of catching Sea Angler. Great chance for Tuna and Ingredients. Good chance for other fish.
Can be obtained from Lure Booster.
Large particle, warm to the touch. You need these to go through a Tooltip|Blue Portal or to make one.
Can be bought from Super Sam in FORESTHILLS or encountered randomly floating in your world during the Mini Events|Superhero Event.
Used to enter the Secret Base or to combine 200 into 1 Tooltip|Blue Portal.
A fine dust that can be combined into a Tooltip|Fossil.
Can be obtained by breaking Tooltip|Sandstone, Tooltip|Granite or Tooltip|Sand.
A tiny rocket with nice colors. A great value for money.
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.
Good chance of catching Kingfish. Medium chance for Butterflyfish and Ingredients. Small chance for other fish.

Bronze Bubblegum Token.desc: A bronze bubblegum machine token that a pet has pets on its adventures in the parallel dimension.

desc: A bronze key that can be used for opening a Bronze Treasure Chest.
Can be obtained from Secret Base.

Bronze Mine Key (LVL 2).desc: A bronze key that opens the entrance to level 2 mine.

Bronze Treasure Chest.desc: This treasure chest contains a random Uncommon or better item from permanent boosters.

Candy Orb.desc: Changes the background of your world into a Candyworld.

desc: By using this gadget it transforms into a fluffy cat home that has a tiny newborn kitten hiding inside.
After using, it becomes untradeable.

Cemetery Orb.desc: A mysterious orb that changes the background of your world into a cemetery scenery.

desc: The classic one-shot explosive. Cover your ears!
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.

City Orb.desc: Turns the background of your world into a Night City.

desc: Awarded from Pots of Gems event. The Leprechaun is desperate for these!
Can be obtained from Pots of Gems event.

Crab Bait.desc: Great chance of catching Crab. Not suited for any other types of fishing or Ingredients.

desc: Enables the player to speak with elegant pronunciation. Duration 15 minutes.

Duration: 15m 0s.
XP Requirement: Lv. 75.

Can be exchanged for items from Pixel Mines#Dark Stone Vendor|Dark Stone Vendor.

Once used, it becomes untradeable.
Gives a random Easter prize when consumed.
Can be obtained from Easter Event|Easter Egg Hunt Event.
This potion gives you more strength for a limited time. Enables you to break things faster. Duration 5 minutes. Causes spontaneous combustion!
Effect: Deal 300% damage to blocks.
Duration: 5m 0s.
XP Requirement: Lv. 50.

Effect: Grants Elven speech.
Duration: 10m 0s.
XP Requirement: Lv 120.

Empty Bottle With Note.desc: Most reliable messaging system for stranded pixelians. Use near a water surface to write your personal message and send it for a random fisher to find.

desc: Placing this will destroy the previous Entrance Portal in the world.
Available in the Shop for 3,750 Gems.
A leather pouch that grants the finder 1000 gems.
Can be obtained from the Netherworld|Nether World, Fishing, Pet Adventure or Farming.
Light up and run! These little explosives leave a mess behind.
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.

Effect: Deal 300% damage to blocks.
Duration: 5m 0s.
XP Requirement: Lv 50.

Duration 3 minutes.

Duration: 2m 0s
XP Requirement: Lv 40.

desc: This medium size rocket draws everyone's attention.
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.

Glowing Fragment.desc: Strange slightly warm fragments of reflecting material. Touching this fills your heart with warm feelings.

Light Absorbing Fragment.desc: Strange cold fragments of light absorbing dark material. Touching this gives you the chills.

desc: Pieces of a World Lock. Combine a hundred of these into a World Lock.
Can be obtained by dismantling a World Lock.
Lost soul of a perma banned scammer. Give 10 of these to Jacko in the world HALLOWEENCASTLE to gain access to THEBLACKTOWER.
Can be found wandering around worlds during the Halloween Event. Punch a few times to collect.

Lucky Lure.desc: Awesome change of catching all fish and ingredients. Only available during the St. Patrick's Event.

desc: A luxurious leather pouch that grants the finder a whooping 10 000 gems!
Can be obtained from the Netherworld|Nether World, Fishing, Pet Adventure or Farming.
A huge spinning wheel that shoots fireworks all around.
You don't want to be near when this baby goes off!
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.
The Ultimate Fireworks! There's no topping this baby!
Can be obtained from Fireworks Booster.

Message in a Bottle.desc: A message in a bottle sent by another pixelian. You can only have one of these unique items in your inventory at a time.

desc: Gold coin with mining related insignia. You get one for exiting mine level 2-5 alive.
You can use these to roll the Pixel Mines#Wheel of Fortune|wheel of fortune.
An all-around lure, that has Medium chance of catching all fish. Also has a Good chance of catching Ingredients.
Can be obtained from Lure Booster.

Nether Ember.desc: Only available from the Deep Nether. Combine 100 of these into one Nether Stone.

desc: Warps the player straight to the exit in Netherworld. What a time saver!
Effect: Warp to Exit in Netherworld.
Duration: Instant

Weather Globe - Halloween.desc: Creates permanent halloween effect into the world. Seasonal item.

Weather Globe - Heavy Rain.desc: If you want to get soaking wet, use this weather globe in your world. Get your raincoats ready!

Weather Globe - Light Rain.desc: Looks like it's starting to rain. Such a nice nize drizzle!

Weather Globe - Light Snow.desc: Snowflakes falling from the sky. A great choice for any winter themed worlds.

Weather Globe - Northern Lights.desc: Use this to create a magnificent display of northern lights in the sky of your world background.

Weather Globe - Pixel Trail.desc: Strange flickering particles that leave a trail behind. Comes with all colors.

Weather Globe - Reset.desc: Removes any weather globe effect in the world.

Weather Globe - Sand Storm.desc: High winds blowing sand everywhere. Darude's favorite!

Weather Globe - Snow Storm.desc: Well, this isn't fun anymore. You can hardly see in this snow storm.

Weather Globe - Valentines.desc: This weather effect adds lovely blinking hearts to your world when consumed.

Blue Hawk.desc: A jet powered stunt plane. Well, at least it looks like one and that's all that matters, right?

Cobra.desc: A cool looking starfighter with with multiple thrusters. Unfortunately, a warp drive system is not installed on this flying mount.

Hot Rod.desc: It's got a propeller and jet engines as tailpipes. It's got it all! Even the paintjob of this flying mount is unparalleled.

Lolly.desc: A fun and colorful flying mount. This entry-level propeller plane gets you racing with your friends whenever you want.

Magic Egg.desc: This half of an Easter egg shell provides a fun and magical flight. It's hard not to smile while taking this for a rid. Easter Event|Seasonal Easter Item.

Moon Rocket.desc: A flying mount suitable for close distance space travel. For some reason the heat shields are not included.

Red Jet.desc: A shiny red flying mount with jet engines. Jet planes don't get much more gorgeous than this!

Space Warrior Jet.desc: Silvery jet of the fierce space warriors. Packed with deactivated plasmaguns just for a show. Community jet design contest winner: Mrcoffeeplay
Space Warrior Jet.{FlyingMounts|gems: 200 000|Golden Aviation Gear|50|Crown of Flames|2|Space Warrior Chassis|1

Spreadfire.desc: An entry-level flying mount. This fighter plane's cannons have been disabled for safety reasons.

Thunderbolt.desc: This entry-level fighter plane has been converted into civilian usage. This flying mount also got a nice new paint job.

desc: It's a Bird... It's a Plane... It's Turbo Sleigh 9000! Looks like Santa trashed his old sleigh and went shopping for a new one. Untradeable.
Xmas bundle exclusive from 2020.

Warhead.desc: A menacing looking flying mount that was probably not meant for this use in the first place. Careful out there!

desc: An old, rusted bicycle wheel. Used for upgrading fishing gear.
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.
A shiny bolt emitting strange energy. Mostly used for creating Potions.
Can be used in a Tooltip|Magic Cauldron.
Can be obtained from Secret Base.

Can be used in Rod Upgrade Station.

Bronze Nugget.desc: These bronze nuggets can be found on mine level 1. Combine 100 of these to create a bronze key to level 2.

Bunny Mechanic.desc: This cute plushy toy has some kind of tools in its hands. What a strange combination. Seasonal Easter Item. Untradeable.

Can be obtained from Epic Superhero Quest.

Feather.desc: Feather of the mythical Pixel Eagle. Potion ingredient, used with Magic Cauldron.

desc: A fish bone that can be sacrificed in the Demon Altar. Found only during Halloween Event|Halloween.
Can be obtained by Fishing during Halloween Event|Halloween.
A part of an ancient Fossil. Restore to reveal a hidden Fossil piece.
Can be obtained by breaking Sand, Sandstone, Granite or by converting 100 Bone Dust.
Visit Fossil Guide to find out more on how to obtain and assemble Rare Fossil Pieces.

Gold Nugget.desc: These gold nuggets can be found on mine level 3. Combine 100 of these to create a gold key to level 4.

Gold Tooth.desc: Ouch! Someone's lost a really valuable golden tooth. What a lucky find!

Golden Aviation Gear.desc: Take these precious ingredients to the Flying Mount Vendor and buy yourself a new Flying Mount!

desc: A long-lost boot. Probably just fell out from someone's foot? For fishing gear upgrades.
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.

Matchbox.desc: A matchbox that still has all matches intact. Handle with care!

Miner's Bucket.desc: An iron bucket that's still in great condition considering how old it is. They sure made things last back in the day.

desc: A soul of a dead Netherworld|Nether creature. Mostly used for creating potions.
Can be used in a Magic Cauldron.
Can be obtained from Netherworld and Deep Nether.
Coin from some forgotten sunken kingdom. Who might still accept these as a payment?
Used to buy items from the Nether Vendor.

Old Miners Shoe.desc: An old and worn shoe of a miner. The leg that it belonged to is hopefully not anywhere near!

desc: This pickaxe repair kit restores any pickaxe's durability to it's maximum.
Available from the Mining Gear NPC on PIXELMINES for - gems.

Piece of Rope.desc: A piece of rope that looks as if it's still usable. Hopefully.

desc: A pink pearl for upgrading your fishing gear. What a lucky catch!
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.

Platinum Nugget.desc: These platinum nuggets can be found on mine level 4. Combine 100 of these to create a platinum key to level 5.

Pocket Watch.desc: This has to be somebody's long-lost heirloom. It's the rarest of all ingredients found in mines.

desc: A propeller that fell out of a boat. Used for fishing gear upgrades.
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.

Rusty Nail.desc: A basic nail that has rusted and bent. Can be still used as an ingredient to some gear and other stuff.

desc: A nice seashell. Used for those fishing gear upgrades. Nice find!
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.
Warm pebble emitting a beautiful aura. Potion ingredient, used with Magic Cauldron.
You can get by breaking blocks.
Can be used in a Magic Cauldron.

Silver Aviation Gear.desc: A 100 of these silver gears can be combined into 1 Golden Aviation Gear. Untradeable.

Silver Coin.desc: An extremely rare silver coin. This is truly worth some "ka-ching"!

Silver Nugget.desc: These silver nuggets can be found on mine level 2. Combine 100 of these to create a silver key to level 3.

desc: Magical Snail. Potions|Potion ingredient, used with Magic Cauldron.
You can get by breaking blocks.
Can be used in a Magic Cauldron.

Space Warrior Chassis.desc: A chassis for the Space Warrior Jet. You can take this to the Flying Mount Vendor to get the real deal!

desc: An anchor that's been stuck in the bottom of a lake. You can upgrade your fishing gear with it.
Can be used in a Rod Upgrade Station.

Tin Can.desc: A tin dog food can. Dinki-di brand. Not for human consumption. Unless your name is Max.

desc: A rotting zombie arm that has barely readable text written in the palm that says "SACRIFICE".
Can be obtained from Pet Adventures.

AND Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output is ON if all inputs are ON. Returns to your inventory when broken.

DELAY Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. An adjustable logic gate that delays the signal it receives before passing it on. Returns to your inventory when broken.

NAND Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output is ON if at least one of the inputs are OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.

NOR Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output is ON if both inputs are OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.

NOT Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. Output is ON if input is OFF. Otherwise OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.

OR Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output is ON if at least one input is ON. Returns to your inventory when broken.

RANDOMIZER Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. Sends an ON signal to a one random output. Returns to your inventory when broken.

SIGNAL DIVIDER Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. A logic gate that simply repeats the incoming signal to multiple outputs. Returns to your inventory when broken.

SIGNAL HOLDER Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. Holds an ON state for a chosen time when activated. Then returns to OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.

TIMER Gate.desc: A logic gate that has one input and multiple outputs. An adjustable logic gate that alternates between ON and OFF when receiving an ON signal. Returns to your inventory when broken.

TOGGLE Gate.desc: A logic gate that switches its state every time it receives an ON signal.

XNOR Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output in ON if both inputs are ON or both are OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.

XOR Gate.desc: A logic gate that has two inputs and multiple outputs. Output is ON if one input is ON and the other OFF. Returns to your inventory when broken.
